mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, A.* from (select * from reviewboard order by review_seq desc) A, (select @rownum:=0) R) B where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, A.* from (select * from reviewboard order by pass_hit desc, review_seq desc) A, (select @rownum:=0) R) B where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select * from reviewboard order by review_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into reviewboard ( u_seq, company_name, review_title, review_content, review_date ) values( #{u_seq}, #{company_name}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, now() )
mapper.select: select co_name from INCRUIT where co_name like CONCAT('%',#{co_name},'%')
